title: How to Sign Up for PlayStation Network

steps.headline: Press New User on the main login page.
steps.description: If the console is already signed into an account, you can sign out by holding the PS button on the controller and choosing Log out on the “Power” tab.

steps.headline: Complete the “Join Playstation Network” form.
steps.description:
You will need to provide the following information:
Country
Language of choice
Date of birth
City/State/Zip
Email address
Password
Online ID (username)
First name/last name

steps.headline: Click the Verify Now link in the email sent to you.
Press Already Verified on the PS4.
Press Do This Later.
steps.description: You can opt to instead link your Facebook profile to your PS4 account.

steps.headline: Press Skip.
steps.description: You can opt to sign up for PS Plus, but you will need to link a credit card or PayPal account to pay for the subscription fee.

steps.headline: Press Do Not Activate.
steps.description: You will be signed into the Playstation Network on your new account.

steps.headline: Scroll to and select Users from the main menu of your PlayStation home screen.
Navigate to PlayStation Network.
steps.description: This is on the right side of the app marquee.

steps.headline: Press Sign Up for PlayStation Network.
Complete the form.
steps.description:
You will need to provide:
Country
Language preference
Date of birth

steps.headline: Complete the second form.
steps.description:
You will need to provide:
Email address
Password
An answer to the security question into the fields provided on-screen.

steps.headline: Enter an Online ID
steps.description: The Online ID you create will be visible to all online users you connect with via the PlayStation Network, and cannot be changed after you have created your account.

steps.headline: Complete the third form.
steps.description:
You will need to provide:
First and last name
Billing address
Your billing address will be used if you decide to purchase apps and add-ons from the PlayStation Store within PlayStation Network.

steps.headline: Press Continue after verifying the account information is correct.
steps.description: Your PlayStation Network account will be created and is ready to use.

steps.headline: Navigate to https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/ in your web browser.
Complete the sign up form.
steps.description:
You will need to provide the following information:
Email address. Date of birth. Gender. Country/Region. State (if USA). Password. The password must be between at least 8 characters, must contain at least one letter and number, and cannot feature repeating letters.

steps.headline: Click the I am not a robot checkbox.
Click I Agree.
steps.description: Create my account. A verification email will be sent to your registration email address.

steps.headline: Click the Verify Now link in the email sent to you.
Click Continue.
steps.description: This button is the on the page you are redirected to after clicking I Agree. Create my account. Your account will be created and you will be redirected to your account page. At this point you can use Playstation Video and Music services, but must provide additional information to use the Playstation Network for games on a console.

steps.headline: Enter an Online ID.
steps.description: This is you name that will be displayed publicly on the network. IDs can contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

steps.headline: Click Continue again.
steps.description: The information on the “Identity” form should be completed from your initial signup, but you can fill any missing fields before continuing.

steps.headline: Enter payment information (optional).
steps.description: You can opt to enter a credit card number or link a PayPal Account. A linked payment method is necessary to purchase items from the PS Store or to sign up for PS Plus (which is required to play games online).

steps.headline: Click Continue.
steps.description: Your account will be fully set up and ready to use on a Playstation Console.

Country

You can opt to sign up for PS Plus, but you will need to link a credit card or PayPal account to pay for the subscription fee. Press Do Not Activate. You will be signed into the Playstation Network on your new account. PS3 Scroll to and select Users from the main menu of your PlayStation home screen.  Select Create New User.  Navigate to PlayStation Network. This is on the right side of the app marquee. Press Sign Up for PlayStation Network.  Press Create a New Account.  Complete the form. You will need to provide:
Country
Language preference
Date of birth Scroll to and press Continue.  Scroll to and press Accept.  Complete the second form. You will need to provide:
Email address
Password
An answer to the security question into the fields provided on-screen. Press Continue.  Enter an Online ID The Online ID you create will be visible to all online users you connect with via the PlayStation Network, and cannot be changed after you have created your account. Press Continue.  Complete the third form. You will need to provide:
First and last name
Billing address
Your billing address will be used if you decide to purchase apps and add-ons from the PlayStation Store within PlayStation Network. Press Continue.  Press Continue after verifying the account information is correct. Your PlayStation Network account will be created and is ready to use. Playstation Website Navigate to https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/ in your web browser.  Click Create a New Account.  Complete the sign up form. You will need to provide the following information:
Email address. Date of birth. Gender. Country/Region. State (if USA). Password. The password must be between at least 8 characters, must contain at least one letter and number, and cannot feature repeating letters. Click the I am not a robot checkbox.  Click I Agree. Create my account. A verification email will be sent to your registration email address. Click the Verify Now link in the email sent to you.  Click Continue. This button is the on the page you are redirected to after clicking I Agree. Create my account. Your account will be created and you will be redirected to your account page. At this point you can use Playstation Video and Music services, but must provide additional information to use the Playstation Network for games on a console. Click Update Account.  Enter an Online ID. This is you name that will be displayed publicly on the network. IDs can contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens. Click Continue.  Click Continue again. The information on the “Identity” form should be completed from your initial signup, but you can fill any missing fields before continuing. Enter address information.  Click Continue.  Enter payment information (optional). You can opt to enter a credit card number or link a PayPal Account. A linked payment method is necessary to purchase items from the PS Store or to sign up for PS Plus (which is required to play games online). Click Continue. Your account will be fully set up and ready to use on a Playstation Console.
